Song.title: Three In One
Song.copyright: Words & Music by Mark Altrogge Â© 2004 Sovereign Grace Praise

Arrangement.text:
Intro: [E E/G# | A E/G# | A E/G# | B |]
Verse 1: [E]Gracious F[E/G#]ather,{,} [A]it was Your [E/G#]love for the world [A]That moved You [E/G#]to send your o[B]nly Son [E]Gracious F[E/G#]ather,{,} [A]this was Your [E/G#]plan from all time [A]To have a [E/G#]people to [B]call Your own Gracious F[G#m]ather,{,} full of m[A]ercy, I sing Your pr[B]aise
Chorus: [E]Fa[F#m]ther, I [D2]love You Praise You [E]Jesus, [F#m]only [D2]Son [E]Spirit, [F#m]I [ ]a[D2]dore You Holy [A/C#]God, Three in [E E/G# | A E/G# | A E/G# | B |]One
Verse 2: [E]Precious J[E/G#]esus,{,} [A]though You were [E/G#]reigning on high [A]Humbly You [E/G#]came and were b[B]orn a man [E]Precious J[E/G#]esus,{,} [A]You were the [E/G#]servant of all [A]You gave Your [E/G#]life as the F[B]ather planned Precious J[G#m]esus,{,} full of k[A]indness, I sing Your pr[B]aise
Verse 3: [E]Holy S[E/G#]pirit,{,} [A]You bring this [E/G#]good news to men [A]You open [E/G#]up blinded e[B]yes to see [E]Holy S[E/G#]pirit,{,} [A]come now and [E/G#]open my heart [A]Reveal the [E/G#]Lord Jesus Ch[B]rist to me Holy S[G#m]pirit,{,} full of p[A]ower, I sing Your pr[B]aise
Arrangement.searchtext: intro verse 1 gracious father it was your love for the world that moved you to send your only son gracious father this was your plan from all time to have a people to call your own gracious father full of mercy i sing your praise chorus father i love you praise you jesus only son spirit i adore you holy god three in one verse 2 precious jesus though you were reigning on high humbly you came and were born a man precious jesus you were the servant of all you gave your life as the father planned precious jesus full of kindness i sing your praise verse 3 holy spirit you bring this good news to men you open up blinded eyes to see holy spirit come now and open my heart reveal the lord jesus christ to me holy spirit full of power i sing your praise
